title: Moving Hearts - Moving Hearts (1981) feat. Christy Moore

Many great players (DÃƒÂ³nal Lunny  and Christy Moore of Planxty, Declan Sinnott,  and Davy Spillane) from so many areas of Irish music - simply the best at combining Rock, Jazz and Traditional Folk, and politics, too - creating a powerful and unique Irish sound.

Moving Hearts

Moving Hearts

(1st Album)

1981



  CD / 2000 / VBR-V0



Tracklist:

1. Hiroshima Nagasaki Russian Roulette
 
2. Irish Ways and Irish Laws
 
3. McBrides 

4. Before the Deluge 

5. Landlord 

6. Category

Moving Hearts:

Christy Moore (vocals, guitar & bodhran)

Donal Lunny (bouzouki)

Declan Sinnott (guitar)

Davy Spillane (uilleann pipes)

Keith Donald (alto sax)

Eoghan O'Neill (bass)

Brian Calnan (drums)



Recorded at Keystone Studios and Windmill Lane Studios, Dublin in the Summer of 1981
